formattedAddress: 243 E 14th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 243 E 14th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

editorialSummary.text: British-style pub & eatery providing elevated bar bites along with gin cocktails & U.K. brews.

originalText.text:
This is long overdue! I organized my office holiday party here and if I could give more stars I would. We had around 40 people and had the whole middle room to ourselves. It was perfect and roomy. Not expensive at all and your money goes a long way here.

The service was unbelievable from accommodating all the requests, like our champagne toast, and just being on their A game the day of the event.

The space is so warm and lovely. The decorations they do for the holiday season are stunning. We didn’t have to add a thing!

The food was so so good! We all were very impressed because it was all the type of casual food you’d want at a party but restaurant quality. Not your typical bar food at all. Everyone left so happy and full and was talking about it for weeks!

I’m not a review person but it really was an amazing experience. Thank you thank you

originalText.text: We went on a Tuesday for the Gin Club experience. This was amazing and so fun! Included in our ticket were 3 cocktails, (and a few shots!) AND food!! For only $35 this is a total steal for NYC! It was like a tasting mixed with a cocktail making class. We learned so much about gin and its was SO FUN! The food here is also amazing,(we added the wings and the croquettes) cant recommend this place enough! We are definitely coming back on a weekend we heard its the best place for a fun weekend night out!! See picture of the awesome cocktails we made!

originalText.text: The Winslow was the PERFECT spot for our engagement party the Friday before new years. We had a roped off section so our friends could enjoy without having to mix with other people. The staff was so so sweet and attentive making sure we ha everything we needed and checking in constantly. We had some party platter food that was delicious and they didn't overcharge like so many other places in the city. We were slated to be there from 6-9 but once the DJ started no one wanted to leave and we ended up staying until 1am! The space is so cute and the team is wonderful I would highly recommend hosting an event here or just coming in for one of their amazing cocktails!! THANK YOU!!!

originalText.text: We went to this bar after dinner. The bouncers were incredible. They were so fun to talk to and banter with. When we got in there was a decent crowd but it didn't feel too crowded. Their music was amazing. They made my espresso martini the way I loved it. The drinks were affordable so much that I was so shook by my bill. I would 100% come back to this place.

text.text: We went to this bar after dinner. The bouncers were incredible. They were so fun to talk to and banter with. When we got in there was a decent crowd but it didn't feel too crowded. originalText.text: I can’t speak to the food here so I put a five stars for the food but the drinks are pretty good. I like them and the prices aren’t really bad. They have happy hours as well. I would just say that it’s quiet during the week, especially weeknights not a really exciting place to go. I would recommend going on the weekends and again they’re not as prepared for the service when it does get busy so that would be the only callout. Cocktails are really good as well. I would definitely come back and try the food because it does look interesting but I will try that next time.
